procedures functions views indexes and constraints triggers and required SQL tuning to reduce the response time in the application Used Github for version control to track and maintain the different version of the application Work with Business Analyst Product Manager Project Manager to ensure solutions meet product requirements Involved in analyzing and implementation of CRChange Request
